moduleName: Knee injury and Osteoarthritis Outcome Score

pages.description: Answer every question by selecting the appropriate response, only one response for each question. If you are unsure about how to answer a question, please  give the best answer you can.
These questions should be answered thinking of your knee symptoms during the last week.

items.text: Do you have swelling in your knee?
Do you feel grinding, hear clicking or any other type of noise when your knee moves?
Does your knee catch or hang up when moving?
Can you straighten your knee fully?
Can you bend your knee fully?

pages.description: The following questions concern the amount of joint stiffness you have experienced during the last week in your knee. Stiffness is a sensation of restriction or slowness in the ease with which you move your knee joint.

items.text: How severe is your knee joint stiffness after first wakening in the morning?
How severe is your knee stiffness after sitting, lying or resting later in the day?

pages.description: The following questions concern the amount of pain you experience in your knee.

items.text: How often do you experience knee pain?

pages.description: What amount of knee pain have you experienced the last week during the following activities?

The following questions concern your physical function. By this we mean your ability to move around and to look after yourself. For each of the following activities please indicate the degree of difficulty you have experienced in  the last week due to your knee.

items.text: Bending to floor/pick up an object
Lying in bed (turning over, maintaining knee position)
Heavy domestic duties (moving heavy boxes, scrubbing floors, etc)

pages.description: The following questions concern your physical function when being active on a higher level. The questions should be answered thinking of what degree of difficulty you have experienced during the last week due to your knee.
The following questions concern the impact of your knee on your quality of life.

items.text: How often are you aware of your knee problem?
Have you modified your life style to avoid potentially damaging activities to your knee?
How much are you troubled with lack of confidence in your knee?
In general, how much difficulty do you have with your knee?

submissionPage.description: Scroll up to change any of your answers.

about: This survey asks for your view about your knee. This information will help your clinician keep track of how you feel about your knee and how well you are able to perform your usual activities.
